member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Tool
member.summary: The path to the generator executable.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Automatic
member.summary: If 'true', the generator will be spawned and triggered when an input file is imported.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Watch
member.summary: If 'true', the generator will be triggered when an input file is modified.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Debug
member.summary: If 'true', the generator will spawn a visible console window and all logs will be printed to the console.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Timeout
member.summary: Delay in seconds after which the generation will be aborted.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Inputs
member.summary: Files or directories that will be included in the generation. These paths are recursive.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Output
member.summary: Directory where the generated files will be copied to.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Assemblies
member.summary: Files or directories that will be included as assembly references in the generation. These paths are non-recursive.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Suffix
member.summary: Namespace suffix that will be added to hold the generated types.

member.name: P:Entia.Unity.Editor.GeneratorSettings.Log
member.summary: Log file path relative to the output path.
